title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.7 - Review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.7 - Review

State Regulations

The procedure for review by an owner in the event of
failure by an appropriate body to grant a fallout shelter application shall be
in the manner provided by law for appeals from determinations by the
appropriate body in enforcing the Multiple Dwelling Law, Multiple Residence

Law, the State Building Construction Code (Chapter I of Subtitle S of Title 9
of the Codes, Rules and Regulations of the State of New York), or any other
provision of law relating to the construction, maintenance or use of buildings, structures or other real property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
502.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
